alert.note: Alert for Box Elder (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 03 at 6:41PM MDT until July 03 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WEBER...SOUTHEASTERN CACHE...EAST CENTRAL BOX ELDER...SOUTHWESTERN RICH AND NORTHEASTERN MORGAN COUNTIES... At 641 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 18 miles southwest of Woodruff, or 24 miles northeast of Morgan, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hyrum, Mantua, Nibley, Paradise, Nordic Valley, Causey Reservoir, Powder Mountain and Avon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
